review: Having trouble mirroring my devices on my TV with this product. Even though it says it is supposed to be able to do that...? Its been too long for this item not to be able to work with Apple products!!!!
author: Sacky

review: The Fire stick has been good for my 3 year old and 6 year old. The format and remote are easier for them than the Xbox controller. I'm disappointed that it needs to be plugged in to a wall outlet, but I appreciate the format. Its really just one more tool in the toolbox, and isn't revolutionary in any way.
author: Jessica Huber
